attributes.action: Give Tommy Steele a knight hood in the birthday honours awards
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel that it is unfair that Tommy Steele has again been overlooked for a knight hood. Tommy was our first rock and roll singer in this country, he went to america and brought it over to england. he has given many years of entertainment to this country and is still performing on stage. he should be recognised for all the years of hard work he has given to entertainment, from rock and roll singer to film star and now stage performer
